definitions.definition: To go too far beyond (a limit); especially, to cross boundaries or exceed norms or conventions .
examples: That color scheme really oversteps the bounds of good taste.

definitions.definition: To take a step in which the foot touches ground too far forward.
To move with a gait such that the hind foot touches the ground forward of the point where the front foot touches the ground.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To go too far beyond (a limit); especially, to cross boundaries or exceed norms or conventions .
secondary_definitions: To take a step in which the foot touches ground too far forward.
To move with a gait such that the hind foot touches the ground forward of the point where the front foot touches the ground.
